'''''The Red Meanies' Revenge''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must remove all the [[Red Meanies]] and Mini Meanies from [[Bravais' Press Works]] as part of the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] "[[Arkhium Forge]]".
